name: Run Screaming
body:
### Welcome 

Welcome to the TU Graz gamedev game Run Screaming.

* Player 1: [Play the game!](http://runscreaming.github.io/runscreaming/)
* Other players: [Download the maps!](https://github.com/RunScreaming/RunScreaming-Game/tree/master/Run%20Screaming/Assets/mazePlots)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
